DocAttribute.Name: Axis
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction of the local Z axis.

DocAttribute.Name: Z
DocAttribute.Documentation: The normalized direction of the local Z axis. It is either identical with the Axis value, if given, or it defaults to [0.,0.,1.]

DocWhereRule.Name: AxisIs3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Axis when given should only reference a three-dimensional IfcDirection.

DocWhereRule.Name: LocationIs3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Cartesian point defining the Location shall have the dimensionality of 3.
